/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the greenery contrasting beautifully against the blue sky.
